name: Iris
description:
Another experiment with illumination from interaction. I've made the material much less absorbent and set it off from the background, so light makes it past just the boundaries when things are diffuse. In the end this also changes the simulation, giving much more large-scale, fluid-like features than compact gliders. / @ngutten

2560 x 1440 png
11/15/21
Nicholas Guttenberg
